edu.vt.middleware.ldap.ldif
Class Ldif

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.middleware.ldap.ldif.Ldif
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Ldif
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Ldif contains functions for converting LDAP search result sets into LDIF.

Version:
$Revision: 358 $ $Date: 2009-07-24 12:11:31 -0400 (Fri, 24 Jul 2009) $
Author:
Middleware Services
See Also:
Serialized Form
